Simulation Tools (sim_tools)¶

This module contains simulations tools for both Discrete Simulations and Continuous Simulations.

Matrix Generation¶

Functions to generate types of matrix for simulations.

random_mat(a, b) Generate a random a x b matrix.
random_stable(n) Generate a random n x n stable matrix.
random_unit(n) Generate a random n x n matrix with spectral radius less than 1.

Continuous Simulations¶

Solving setups of the form,

Initialisation and Setting Matrices¶

simulate_cont.__init__([n, no, nu]) Generate a simulate_cont object.
simulate_cont.setABC(A[, B, C]) Set A, B, C matrices for a continuous simulation.
simulate_cont.setA(A) Set drift matrix, A.
simulate_cont.setB(B) Set input matrix, B.
simulate_cont.setC(C) Set output matrix, C.
simulate_cont.setx0(x0) Set intital conditions, x0.
simulate_cont.set_plot_points(points) Set number of points to use when plotting, plot_points.

Getting Values¶

simulate_cont.get_x(t) Calculate a state vector at a particular time.
simulate_cont.get_y(t) Calculate an output vector at a particular time.
simulate_cont.get_x_set(times) Calculate a set of x values.
simulate_cont.get_y_set(times[, xs]) Calculate a set of y values.

Plotting and Saving¶

simulate_cont.set_plot_points(points) Set number of points to use when plotting, plot_points.
simulate_cont.plot(times[, plot_points, …]) Summary
simulate_cont.plot_state(times[, …]) Summary
simulate_cont.plot_output(times[, …]) Summary
simulate_cont.save_state(filename, times[, …]) Save a set of state vectors.
simulate_cont.save_output(filename, times[, …]) Save a set of output vectors

Simulation Properties¶

simulate_cont.is_controllable() Tests if the simulate_cont object is controllable.
simulate_cont.is_observable() Tests if the simulate_cont object is observable.

Discrete Simulations¶

Solving setups of the form,

Initialisation and Setting Matrices¶

simulate_disc.__init__([n, no, nu]) Generate a simulate_disc object.
simulate_disc.setABC(A[, B, C]) Summary
simulate_disc.setA(A) Summary
simulate_disc.setB(B) Summary
simulate_disc.setC(C) Summary
simulate_disc.setx0(x0) Summary

Getting Values¶

simulate_disc.get_x(k) Summary
simulate_disc.get_y(k) Summary
simulate_disc.get_x_set(ks) Summary
simulate_disc.get_y_set(ks[, xs]) Summary

Plotting and Saving¶

simulate_disc.plot(ks[, filename, grid]) Summary
simulate_disc.plot_state(ks[, filename, grid]) Summary
simulate_disc.plot_output(ks[, filename, grid]) Summary
simulate_disc.save_state(filename, ks[, xs]) Summary
simulate_disc.save_output(filename, ks[, ys]) Summary

Simulation Properties¶

simulate_disc.is_controllable() Summary
simulate_disc.is_observable() Summary
